title: Did you hear that?
description: Gene Simmons, former frontman of the popular rock band KISS, has announced a new solo album. Gene described his portrait for the album cover as 'The creepiest I have looked since Lick It Up!'

title: The Ultimate Tech Quiz
description: Famous beneficiary of Apartheid, Elon Musk wants to 're-standardize IQ tests to measure the only form of intelligence that matters... technofscism.' Mr. Musk claims the new servers used to run these IQ tests will be powered by spare emeralds he just happened to have lying around.

title: Roll 'Em Up
description: Earlier today, president Joe Biden signed a contract to become the new spokesperson of Smoke De'Pot, the marijuana dispensary chain founded by Ryan Reynolds' significantly less talented brother.
